title: roasted pork belly with cider and apple sauce and creamy mash
description: Pork and apple is a classic combination, James Martin shows you how to take it to the next level.
ingredients: 1.8kg/3lb 15oz pork belly, skin scored with a sharp knife
salt flakes and freshly ground black pepper
30g/1oz soft dark brown sugar, or to taste
300g/11oz King Edward potatoes, peeled and cut into chunks
salt and freshly ground black pepper
